search_results.snippet:
Kit Kat is a chocolate-covered wafer biscuit bar confection created by Rowntree's 
of York, England, and is now produced globally by Nestl, which acquired 
Rowntree in 1988, with the exception of the United States where it is made under 
license by H.B. Reese Candy Company, a division of The Hershey Company ... 
The product's official title of Rowntree's Chocolate Crisp was renamed Kit Kat...
